Enum PagingAlgorithm

public enum PagingAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Enum<PagingAlgorithm>

Abstracts FIFO, LRU and Random page replacement algorithms, and their page replacement techniques

Author:
Sailee Latkar

public abstract int Evict(java.util.LinkedList<Page> pageFrames,
                          int clock)
Chooses the page to evict based on the algorithm

Parameters:

clock - time of eviction
Returns:

fetchPage

public int fetchPage(java.util.LinkedList<Page> pageFrames,
                     int clock)
Fetches a page into a pageframe, based on the page replacement algorithm chosen

Parameters:
pageFrames - linked list of pages representing page frames
clock - time at which page is to be made resident
Returns:
index of the free page
